repositoryCreatedBy.title: Created by user identifier
repositoryCreatedBy.description: User ID of who created the record.

repositoryLastModifiedBy.title: Modified by user identifier
repositoryLastModifiedBy.description: User ID of who last modified the record. At creation time, `modifiedByUser` is set as `createdByUser`.

createdByBatchID.title: Created by batch identifier
createdByBatchID.description: The dataset files in Catalog which has been originating the creation of the record.

modifiedByBatchID.title: Modified by batch identifier
modifiedByBatchID.description: The last dataset files in Catalog which has modified the record. At creation time, `modifiedByBatchID` is set as `createdByBatchID`.

createDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was created in the repository, such as when an asset file is first uploaded or a directory is created by the server as the parent of a new asset. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

modifyDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was last modified in the repository, such as when a new version of an asset is uploaded or a directory's child resource is added or removed. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

timeSeriesEvents.title: Time-series Events
timeSeriesEvents.description: List of time-series based events that relate to schemas based on record.

accountID.title: Contact Account id
accountID.description: ID of the account thatâ€™s the parent of this person.

isBlocked.title: Blocked Indicator
isBlocked.description: Indicator if the person is blocked or not.

blockedCause.title: Blocked Cause
blockedCause.description: Reason why the person is blocked.

marketingSuspendedCause.title: Marketing Suspended Cause
marketingSuspendedCause.description: Reason why the person is suspended for any marketing purposes.

isConverted.title: Converted Indicator
isConverted.description: Indicates whether the Lead was successfully converted or not.

convertedDate.title: Converted Date
convertedDate.description: Date of conversion if the lead was successfully converted.

convertedContactID.title: Converted Contact ID
convertedContactID.description: Contact Id if the lead was successfully converted.

personOptInOut.title: Person Preferences
personOptInOut.description: Holds opt out values for different channels as selected by the person.

personStatus.title: Person Status
personStatus.description: Field recording the current marketing/sales status of the Person.

personSource.title: Person Source
personSource.description: Source from where the information regarding the person was received.

personScore.title: Person Score
personScore.description: A Score generated for a person by the CRM system.

person.title: Person
person.description: An individual actor, contact, or owner.

otherAddress.title: Other Address
otherAddress.description: Other/Alternate postal address of the person.

otherPhone.title: Other Phone
otherPhone.description: Other/Alternate phone number of the person.

departments.title: Department Name
departments.description: Department name where the person works.

val.title: Choice Value
val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

time.title: Preference timestamp
time.description: Date and time this specific preference was collected. This value should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: A set of notifications, newsletters, etc. to which the user subscribes

additionalProperties.title: Subscription
additionalProperties.description: The name or identifier of the specific subscription

val.title: Choice Value
val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

subscribers.title: Subscribers
subscribers.description: The set of identifiers (email addresses, phone numbers, etc.) for this user who have subscribed

additionalProperties.title: Subscriber
additionalProperties.description: The specific identifier (email addresses, phone numbers, etc.) for this subscriber

time.title: Preference timestamp
time.description: Date and time this specific preference was collected. This value should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

source.title: Preference Source
source.description: Through which interface did the user provide this preference value

time.title: Preference timestamp
time.description: Date and time this specific preference was collected. This value should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

time.title: Consent/Preferences timestamp
time.description: Timestamp of this complete set of user consents and preferences. This value should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

joinDate.title: Program Join Date
joinDate.description: Date which the visitor registered for the loyalty program.

loyaltyID.title: Program ID
loyaltyID.description: The loyalty program ID(s) associated with a specific user, if they are enrolled in the client's loyalty program.

points.title: Program Points Balance
points.description: Current balance of the loyalty points/awards in a visitor's loyalty account.

pointsExpiration.title: Points Expiration
pointsExpiration.description: Date on which the loyalty points expire.

pointsRedeemed.title: Points Redeemed
pointsRedeemed.description: Amount of points applied toward a purchase or otherwise redeemed.

pointsAsOfDate.title: Points as of date
pointsAsOfDate.description: Point balance on the current date

program.title: Program Name
program.description: This should define the loyalty progam in which a visitor is enrolled.

orgUnit.title: Organizational unit
orgUnit.description: The unit within the organization owning the profile. This can be used to reference the organization details maintained in another dataset.

geoUnit.title: Geographical unit
geoUnit.description: The geographical unit within the organization owning the profile. This can be used to reference the geographical information maintained in another dataset.

preferredLanguage.title: Preferred language
preferredLanguage.description: Describes the preferred system of communication used by the profile. Language codes are expressed in BCP 47 format.

emailFormat.title: Email format
emailFormat.description: Email format preferred by the profile. This can be rich text or plain text.

timeZone.title: Time zone
timeZone.description: Describes which time zone the profile is present in, most frequently the time zone preferred by the profile. Time zones are expressed according to the IETF tz database: https://www.ietf.org/timezones/tzdb-2016i/tz-link.htm

optInOut.title: OptInOut
optInOut.description: Describes a users opting in and out preferences for communication by medium and communication type.

identityPrivacyInfo.title: Identity level privacy information
identityPrivacyInfo.description: Captured privacy information for identities in profile.

identityIABConsent.title: Identity level consent information
identityIABConsent.description: Consent collected for an identity via consent management services.

consentTimestamp.title: Timestamp of consent
consentTimestamp.description: Timestamp (RFC3339) when this identity presented consent information

consentString.title: Captured consent information
consentString.description: Consent string and its specification. This can help reading application to use appropriate library.

pushNotificationTokens.title: Push notification tokens
pushNotificationTokens.description: Push notification tokens are used to communicate with applications that are installed on devices or SaaS application accounts.

pushNotificationDetails.title: Push details
pushNotificationDetails.description: Push details array containing notification info required to send mobile push notification to a specific mobile application on a given device.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: Subscriptions that the profile is entitled to including terminated, expired, or exhausted subscriptions.

testProfile.title: Test profile
testProfile.description: Indicates the `profile` record is for use in testing and verification purposes and should not be automatically included in normal operations.

userAccountPersonalDetails.title: User Account Personal Details
userAccountPersonalDetails.description: Extension of the Personal Profile data type.

userAccountStart.title: User Account Start Date
userAccountStart.description: Date when the account was opened.

userAccountStatus.title: User Account Status
userAccountStatus.description: This should describe the current status of the account

userAccountType.title: User Account Type
userAccountType.description: Captures the user account type, if applicable.

userAccountPreferences.title: User Account Preferences
userAccountPreferences.description: M/F, other shopping preferences. Preferences in personal profile is already captured- things like perferred method of contact, not shopping prefs.
